Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Pump cavitation noise observed. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Design limitation in component load capacity under extreme conditions
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Steering Control component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement condition-based monitoring system
d) Attributable Code: NFF - No Failure Found
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate.
Date: 11/03/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde S.B. Rao
